name: Lady Bug
overview: You're Invited to a Garden Party! It's dinnertime and Lady Bug is ready to eat! Take a stroll through the garden and nibble on the rows and rows or pretty flowers. Be careful though - there are many dangerous insects that just love to eat ladybugs - and they're fast too! Block their way by swinging the gates closed, and stay away from the deadly poison. Oh - and don't forget to collect the bonus prizes to get the help of other ladybugs and a special invite to the Veggie Bounty Harvest!
